name: neoDefense - Tower Defense
description:
DEFEND YOUR SPROUT OF NEW LIFE FROM INVADER!
[Build, Upgrade and Sweep!]
neoDefense is a defense game set in a core of new life invaded by countless creeps. A game that is a new twist of tower defense games, something that will keep you hooked and intriguingly challenged!

YOU ARE UNDER ATTACK

Build your fortress any way you wish, upgrade weapons and let the invasions begin! And sweep them! Don’t go over yourself & think that you can always win – strategize!

MAKE SMART DECISIONS

This game need your brilliant idea to defeat enemies attack! Each mission has its own mind-challenging hardness, show that your enemies can never outsmart you. Use weapons, plan and destroy the invaders.

MIND-BOGLING GRAPHICS

Enjoy stunning vector graphics accompanied with thrilling sound effects & animations. Be prepared for astounding visual heaven. One of the best you’ll see in a defense game.

[neoDefense FEATURES]

• Build your own fortress for incoming waves of enemies!
• More than 2,500 waves of creeps across 99 missions (And will be added more later!)
• 5 upgradable weapons to kill the creeps with style (And will be added more later!)
• There is a BOSS at the end of each group of missions (It's too hard to beat!)
• Amazing soundtrack in each group of missions
• Astounding variation of the classic defense games
• Thrilling HD graphics


[IN-APP PURCHASES]

Each in-app purchase can make you challenge more missions from Gamma sector.

[TESTIMONIAL]

“Banging game”
“Great balance of fun and strategy”
